name: Ancient Castle
description:
This is very unfinished and still work in progress.

You've arrived in a castle, but why?

Features:

  • Movement with arrow keys (so revolutionary)
  • Coins to steal (up to 28 for now!)
  • A phantom to talk to (his name is Phantam, not a typo!)
  • A great quest about cutlery!
  • Amazing, riveting dialog!
  • A skeleton that tries to follow you but can not hurt you
    • Spoiler, you can't hurt it.
  • Probably bugs left and right
